tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE utility_infrastructure (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    type VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE utility_poles (
    pole_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location GEOGRAPHY,
    height INT,
    condition VARCHAR(50),
    installation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE power_lines (
    line_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    start_pole_id INT,
    end_pole_id INT,
    voltage INT,
    material VARCHAR(50),
    length FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE water_pipes (
    pipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    start_location GEOGRAPHY,
    end_location GEOGRAPHY,
    diameter INT,
    material VARCHAR(50),
    installation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE utility_assets (
    asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name TEXT,
    location_lat DECIMAL,
    location_long DECIMAL,
    company_id INT REFERENCES utility_companies(company_id)
);
